prompt: A majestic figure cloaked in flowing, star-studded robes stands at the helm of a celestial city. Nebula Empress Lyna has an ethereal presence, with hair that seems to be made of shimmering stardust and eyes that glow with cosmic light. She stands amidst a backdrop of colorful nebulae and distant galaxies, with the light of distant stars reflecting off her intricate, celestial crown made of radiant constellations. Ethereal, majestic, and otherworldly, this scene combines futuristic technology with mystical, ancient aesthetics in a cosmic setting.
